title: EURIDICE - European Inter-Disciplinary Research on Intelligent Cargo for Efficient, Safe and Environment-friendly Logistics

author: Mitja Jermol, Centre for knowledge transfer in IT, Jožef Stefan Institute

segmentation: Is 7, so European FP 7 research project things an IP on intelligent transport which actually supports the filming.

What will be then the transport 3.0 and our idea then was to put intelligence into transport.
So there is a paradigm shift in this IP actually to focus more or less to the intelligence.

Which will use the data coming from the environment from different containers but also external data from weather conditions from the environment conditions for the traffic conditions with the background knowledge which we formalize understandable machines that will also then provide the context back to the local intelligence.
And of course based on that we will develop tools for deep analysis, alerting anomaly detection, event prediction and trend detection.
